fields.social_Titlu: Another representative of the Russian Embassy, caught drunk while driving
fields.Continut:
Another representative of the Russian Embassy in Chisinau was stopped by police showing signs of ebriety. It happened last night on the Bucuresti street in the capital, enounced for Deschide.MD the deputy head of IGP, Gheorghe Cavcaliuc. 

According to him, the patrol police "pulled him over" with the suspicion that he is drunk. Subsequently the employee was taken to the Central Police Station where he was issued a criminal case on the fact of refusal to give the breathalyser test.

"Then were notified the Embassy representatives who came to the scene and assisted their employee. We do not know yet whether he had the status of a diplomat or not", has completed Cavcaliuc. 

We remind that two weeks ago, another employee of the Russian Embassy, with the status of a diplomat, was filmed while doing gigs at the wheel of a car with diplomatic numbers. Witnesses who broadcasted the video said that he was drunk. Police from Dubasari noticed this case and they quoted the diplomat for hearings. In turn, the Russian Embassy strongly denied the information published in the media about their representative, claiming that the one who filmed were those who disturbed public order. Also, the Embassy said that the incident took place at a recreation center on the Dniester bank and the police interfered to calm everyone, this information being denied by police.

Details: Show „diplomatic” rusesc la Molovata. Poliţia cere ajutorul martorilor

items.title: Another representative of the Russian Embassy, caught drunk while driving

fields.lead: Moldovan police on Saturday fired tear gas to disperse anti-government protesters during a parade to mark the former Soviet republic's independence day.
fields.Continut:
Moldovan police on Saturday fired tear gas to disperse anti-government protesters during a parade to mark the former Soviet republic's independence day.

Hundreds of demonstrators gathered near the main square of Chisinau, Moldova's capital. Many shouted "thieves!" and "shame on you!" as President Nicolae Timofti and other officials laid floral wreaths at a monument honoring Stephen the Great, a 15th-century Moldovan hero.

Few citizens were permitted to enter the square amid heavy police security. No injuries from Saturday's clashes were reported.

Underlining tensions, Timofti said in a speech earlier Saturday that Moldova's independence and security were undermined by the presence of "foreign military forces that are on the country's territory against the wishes of the population."

He was referring to the presence of 1,000 Russian peacekeepers in the pro-Russian separatist enclave of Trans-Dniester in eastern Moldova.

Trans-Dniester broke away from Moldova in 1990 amid fears that it wanted to reunite with Romania, which Moldova was part of until 1940. Some 1,500 died in a war in 1992 between Moldovans and separatists.

European Union member Romania has a close relationship with Moldova. Romanian President Klaus Iohannis said Saturday the day was an occasion to "support projects which seek to improve the lives of all Moldovan citizens and fulfil their European destiny."

Moldova, sandwiched between Romania and Ukraine, declared independence on Aug. 27, 1991, as the Soviet Union unraveled.

The economically struggling nation depends on Russia for most of its gas. Figures published this week found that more than a quarter of Moldova's citizens have emigrated for work, and more than half of them work in Russia.

Source: Fox News

items.title: Associated Press // Protests, tear gas at Moldova independence day parade

fields.lead: Actiunea 2012 asks USA  to recall the Ambassador James Pettit who said a few days ago that "Basarabia is not Romania". The unionists organized a protest in front of the US Embassy in Bucharest. A similar event took place in front of the diplomatic mission in Chisinau.
fields.Continut:
Actiunea 2012 asks USA  to recall the Ambassador James Pettit who said a few days ago that "Basarabia is not Romania". The unionists organized a protest in front of the US Embassy in Bucharest. A similar event took place in front of the diplomatic mission in Chisinau.

"We consider that the statements of the Ambassador Pettit are only his and do not represent the policy of the allied state - USA", said the leader of Actiunea 2012, George Simion.

The protesters wrote a letter addressed to the US Secretary John Kerry, requesting USA to recognize that the statement was a blunder of the Ambassador and the accents have not been put right. "I do not know if our ally, of Romania, can say something like that. We hope that USA will recall this Ambassador and wil apologize. At the same time, we ask the Embassy in Bucharest to make a statement to these assertions", concluded Simion. 

The unionists anounce that will stay non-stop in front of the US Embassy until will not come a first reaction from the American state.

In Chisinau, in front of the demonstrators came a representative from the Embassy to whom they gave several volumes of history, a gesture accompanied by the message: Tell the Ambassador to read and to convince himself that Basarabia is Romania!

We remind that the President of the Senate, Calin Popescu Tariceanu, announced that he will consult with the members of the Standing Bureau and with the leaders of the parliamentary groups, concerning the opportunity of a joint statement regarding the affirmations of the US Ambassador in Chisinau, James Pettit.

And the senator Viorel Badea sent a letter adressed to the US Secretary John Kerry, where he wrote, the lack of a reaction from the US Departament of State, shows that James D. Pettit expressed the official position of the United States of America on relations between the Republic of Moldova and Romania.

The protest in Bucharest:

The protest in Chisinau:

items.title: Protest at US Embassy in Bucharest and Chisinau // Unionists ask for the recall of Ambassador Pettit

fields.social_Titlu: Lawyers declare Platon a hero: He wanted to rescue Moldova and its citizens. Now he is persecuted
fields.lead: The goal of Veaceslav Platon was to rescue the citizens of Moldova from the iniquities happening in this country, but the "mafia" government stopped him. This is the opinion of the Ukrainian attorney Alexei Shevchuk.
fields.Continut:
The goal of Veaceslav Platon was to rescue the citizens of Moldova from the iniquities happening in this country, but the "mafia" government stopped him. This is the opinion of the Ukrainian attorney Alexei Shevchuk.

Today, during  the press conference in Kiev, Alexei Shevchuk stated that numerous violations had been committed  in Platon’s case.

“Only my defendant has the information about the theft of the billion from the banking system. He wanted to protect the Republic of Moldova and its citizens; he wanted to inform the international community about the iniquities in Moldova. He was ready to confess everything to Ukrainian authorities about how the billion had been stolen. Veaceslav Kobalev knew that he would be under political pressure, but he was not scared”,  Alexei Shevchuk declared.

The Russian attorney Ilya Novikov – who earlier defended the interests of the Ukrainian pilot Nadya Savchenko – claims that the extradition process of Veaceslav Platon is based upon hidden interests of Ukrainian and Moldovan decision markers.

“The most important argument of prosecutors is the missing document, confirming the issue of the identity card on Veaceslav Platon’s name. There are competent authorities, which shall verify the legality of documents; however we witnessed a rapid process of examination and extradition of Mr. Kobalev. I am certain that without a political agreement, such procedure of extradition would not be possible. I have a great deal of respect for the Ukrainian President, Petro Poroshenko. I would request the President to demand necessary security measures to be ensured for Mr. Kobalev in the Moldovan penitentiary”, Ilya Novikov stated.

We remind you that Veaceslav Platon, arrested by the Ukrainian authorities at the request of Moldovan prosecutors, was extradited to theRepublicofMoldovalast night. He is under criminal investigation for fraud and money laundering in large proportions, leading to an over 800 million lei damage to Banca de Economii  .

On July 25th , an arrest warrant for 30 days was issued on the name of Veaceslav Platon  and he is wanted internationally. Exactly on the same day, the so called “No. 1 raider of CIS”, Veaceslav Platon, was arrested by the Ukrainian authorities in Kiev.

items.title: Lawyers declare Platon a hero: He wanted to rescue Moldova and its citizens. Now he is persecuted politically.

fields.lead: On the name of the businessman Veaceslav Platon might be initiated other penal causes. The statement was made for Deschide.MD by the chief of Anti-corruption Prosecutor’s Office, Viorel Morari, at the time I called him to make sure how many cases and accusations has currently Platon in Chisinau.
fields.Continut:
On the name of the businessman Veaceslav Platon might be initiated other penal causes. The statement was made for Deschide.MD by the chief of Anti-corruption Prosecutor’s Office, Viorel Morari, at the time I called him to make sure how many cases and accusations has currently Platon in Chisinau. 

Morari said that Platon was extradited on two accusations: money laundering and fraud. 

"Now on his name there is a penal cause with two accusations: money laundering in huge proportions and fraud. We are conducting many penal actions in order to update the content of other files in which he might be involved. Beforehand I can say that there are three more cases in which we are investigating a possible involvement of this citizen, but for now he does not have any status in them. The prosecutors are working on building up evidence, which will allow accusing him on other crimes. More specifically we will talk on this subject most probably next week after we sum up all gathered information", stated Viorel Morari.

We remind that Veaceslav Platon was extradited on the Monday to the Republic of Moldova. On Tuesday, the Buiucani Court was about to consider the prosecutors' requirement on the prolongation of the arrest warranty, however, the hearing was postponed at the prosecutors' request.

Platon has been escorted by masked men, being handcuffed. Passing by journalists he managed to state that "He is not guilty of anything", "All the money stole Vlad Plahotniuc" and that he needs a "toothbrush, clothes, shorts, sneakers and something to eat".

Veaceslav Platon is criminally investigated for fraud and money laundering in huge proportions, fact which damaged the Banca de Economii with over 800 million lei.  

The prosecutors concluded that the money, obtained through deception as credits, were transferred on the accounts of some offshore companies, to conceal its illegal origin, and later, a part of it was used for extinguishing some credits in the banks from the Republic of Moldova.

items.title: Viorel Morari: Other penal cases might be initiated on the name of Platon

fields.social_Titlu: NEWS ALERT // DECIDED: Veaceslav Platon will stay in arrest for 30 days
fields.lead: Veaceslav Platon stays in preventive arrest for 30 days after the judges took the decision, in the today's hearing, to accept the request of the prosecutors to extend the arrest warrant on the the name of Platon.
fields.Continut:
Veaceslav Platon stays in preventive arrest for 30 days after the judges took the decision, in the today's hearing, to accept the request of the prosecutors to extend the arrest warrant, issued on behalf of the person concerned.

While he was escorted in the corridors of the court, Platon stated that "this case has been falsified in order to distract attention from the bank theft that was committed by Vlad Plahotniuc, who robbed this country and humiliated people". On the question whether he had any links with Ilan Shor, Veaceslav Platon has not responded.

We remind that the prolongation of the arrest warrant on the name of Veaceslav Platon was postponed two days ago on the lawyers' request.

Veaceslav Platon, arrested by the Ukrainian authorities at the request of Moldovan prosecutors, was extradited to the Republic of Moldova three days ago. Veaceslav Platon is criminally investigated for fraud and money laundering in huge proportions, fact which damaged the Banca de Economii with over 800 million lei.  

On July 25th , an arrest warrant for 30 days was issued on the name of Veaceslav Platon and he is wanted internationally. Exactly on the same day, the so called “No. 1 raider of CIS”, Veaceslav Platon, was arrested by the Ukrainian authorities in Kiev.

items.title: NEWS ALERT // DECIDED: Veaceslav Platon will stay in preventive arrest for 30 days

fields.social_Titlu: An alleged Minister from Abkhazia was heading to Tiraspol but was turned back at CIA
fields.lead: Deputy Minister of Foreign Affairs from the unrecognized Republic of Abkhazia, Oleg Arshba, who arrived in Moldova at the invitation of the alleged authorities from Tiraspol, made way back from Chisinau International Airport after he could not confirm the purpose of his trip.
fields.Continut:
Deputy Minister of Foreign Affairs from the unrecognized Republic of Abkhazia, Oleg Arshba, who arrived in Moldova at the invitation of the alleged authorities from Tiraspol, made way back from Chisinau International Airport after he could not confirm the purpose of his trip.

According to the press service of the Border Police of Moldova, 

Potrivit Serviciului de presă al Poliției de Frontieră din Republica Moldova, the so-called Deputy Minister, was indeed sent back from Chisinau International Airport, because he could not confirm the purpose of his visit.

NovostiPMR claims that Oleg Arshba was invited by the authorities from Tiraspol, however the purpose of the invitation is not specified.

In this context, Deschide.MD reminds that in Transnistria, on September 2nd, the authorities from the left bank of the Dniester are celebrating the self-proclaimed so-called Pridnestrovian Moldavian Republic.

In his biography is mentioned that Arshba worked in the so-called Ministry of Defense from Abkhazia from 1984 until 2008, during this period holding also the position Deputy Chairman of the Abkhaz Security Service and in 2006 Head of the Intelligence Service under the General Staff of the Armed Forces of the Republic of Abkhazia.

We remind that, last year, several alleged officials from South Ossetia were declared undesirable by the authorities of the Republic of Moldova, after they have participated at the events in Tiraspol and signed a collaboration aggrement with Transnistrians. Later, the alleged Minister of Foreign Affairs of the separatist region South Ossetia has launched serious accusations against the Republic of Moldova.

At the same time, Bureau for Reintegration of the Government assessed the events held in Tiraspol on September 2nd as oriented towards undermining the principles recognized by the international community: sovereignty, independence and territorial integrity of Moldova.

Exactly a year ago, the Minister of Defense, Anatol Salaru, asked for explanations the Russian Embassy in Moldova, after a Russian military attache attended the parade in Tiraspol. Anatol Salaru was saying that Moscow's gesture is an unfriendly one.

items.title: An alleged Minister from Abkhazia was heading to Tiraspol but was turned back at Chisinau International Airport

fields.lead: Președintele Partidului Acțiunea și Solidaritatea, Maia Sandu, a acționat în judecată Cancelaria de Stat pe motiv că instituția refuză să prezinte stenogramele ședințelor Executivului în cadrul cărora au fost acordate garanțiile de stat pentru băncile falimentate. Potrivit politicianului, ar fi vorba de perioada în care Guvernele au fost conduse de Iurie Leancă (2014) și Chiril Gaburici (2015).
fields.Continut:
The State Chancellery of Moldova was sued by Maia Sandu, the president of “Action and Solidarity” Party, for refusing to provide transcripts of meetings in which 2014th Leaca’s government and 2015th Gaburici’s government 2015th granted state guarantees to failed banks.

"Two months ago I asked the State Chancellery to present me the copies of transcripts of government meetings, where they approved state guarantees to those three failed banks (Leanca’s government in 2014 and Gaburici’s government in 2015). It is logical that these discussions on the matter of these decisions can be accessed, because the Government decisions on granting guarantees were declassified. The citizens must know who and what he opted in these discussions, what requested NBM and for what purpose they promised to use the money", wrote Maia Sandu in a Facebook post.

Maia Sandu thinks that the Democrat Party does not want to show “how the thing happened truly”, for the reason that in this case “it would be harder to lie and to blame others”, but the government promises to investigate the bank fraud “is nothing else but lullabies”.

"I sued the State Chancellery, requiring to force it to submit the transcripts from the two Government meetings, because the constitutional right and the law was violated. Sooner or later, all this documents will become public, the truth will prevail, and the country will know all perpetrators", claims Maia Sandu.

items.title: Maia Sandu sued the State Chancellery

fields.social_Titlu: Lazar Comanescu: Respecting the sovereignty of Moldova - a high priority for Romania
fields.lead: The foreign minister, Lazar Comanescu, attended on Thursday, September 1st 2016 the Informal Meeting of Foreign Ministers of OSCE participating States at Postdam (Germany).
fields.Continut:
The foreign minister, Lazar Comanescu, attended Thursday, on September 1st 2016 the Informal Meeting of Foreign Ministers of OSCE participating States at Postdam (Germany).

On this occasion, the Romanian chief diplomat conveyed key messages on areas of priority interest for Romania, focusing on reconfirm support for the sovereignty and territorial integrity of Ukraine and to spur OSCE to act in resolving protracted conflicts.   

In this context, the Foreign Minister noted that, for Romania, solving the Transnistrian conflict by respecting the sovereignty and teritorial integrity of Moldova stays a major priority. He congratulated the Presidency-in-Office of OSCE for organizing a successful round of negotiations in the "5 + 2" format (Berlin, June 2 to 3, 2016) OSCE Presidency-in-office for the success of mediating a meeting in the "5+2" format (Berlin, June 2-3, 2016), stating also the importance of their resumption, after two years of interruption.

The Minister, Lazar Comanescu, also highlighted out the need for full implementation of commitments of OSCE participating States in all three dimensions of the Organization's work: politico-military, economic and environmental and human. He pointed out the specific contribution of Romania in the context that Romania holds the mandate of President of the OSCE Security Committee in 2016, as well as preparations for the takeover in early 2017 chairmanship of the Forum for Security Cooperation/FSC.

The head of Romanian diplomacy encouraged proper functioning of autonomous OSCE mechanisms and institutions, as well as the presence of the Organisation in the field. At the same time, he supported the implementation of OSCE commitments in combating transnational threats and promoting integrated approaches to security challenges multidimensional impact.

items.title: Lazar Comanescu: Respecting the sovereignty of Moldova - a high priority for Romania

fields.social_Titlu: The US Embassy in Moldova congratulates the National Army on its 25th anniversary since its creation
fields.lead: The United States of America Embassy in the Republic of Moldova congratulates the National Army on the occasion of 25 years since its foundation.
fields.Continut:
The United States of America Embassy in the Republic of Moldova congratulates the National Army on the occasion of 25 years since its foundation.

On the Facebook account of the Embassy is posted the following message: Congratulations to the National Army of the Republic of Moldova on the occasion of 25 years since its foundation.

The National Army celebrates today 25 years since its creation. On this occasion, the Ministry of Defense organizes a series of events in the capital and in many other cities of the country.

In Chisinau took place this morning more ceremonies of laying flowers, and the soldiers of the "Ştefan cel Mare" Brigade organize exhibitions of weapons, technics and equipment, exercises of handling the weapons and close fight, as well as militarily porridge for the residents of Chisinau in the Valea Morilor Park.

A festive concert will take place at 4 pm in the Grand National Assembly Square, which will be attended by the Presidential Orchestra of the Republic of Moldova, folk music ensemble "Doina Armatei", choir "Cavlerii Armoniei", ethno folk ensemble "Plaiestii", singers: Vali Boghean, Natalia Proca, Aurica Dicusara, Cristina Scarlat, Anisoara Dabija, Mircea Zgherea. During the event will be launched the photo exhibition "25 years of the National Army in 25 photos". 

On September 3rd, 1991 was signed the Decree No. 194 by the President Mircea Snegur, which created the Armed Forces of the Republic of Moldova.

items.title: The US Embassy in Moldova congratulates the National Army on its 25th anniversary since its creation

fields.lead: The ex-member of the Comrat City Council, Victor Vasilioglo, which was badly injured at the beginning of June after he took a bullet in the head from a person who lost to him in a card play. Vasilioglo died yesterday, September 4th, in intensive care of the Emergency Hospital from Chisinau, transmits Gagauzinfo.
fields.Continut:
The ex-member of the Comrat City Council, Victor Vasilioglo, which was badly injured at the beginning of June after he took a bullet in the head from a gambler who lost to him in a card play. Vasilioglo died yesterday, September 4th, in intensive care of the Emergency Hospital from Chisinau, transmits Gagauzinfo.

We remind you that the incident happend on June 6 in Comrat. Victor Vasilioglo argued with a individual, named Nicolai Ibris, who lost to Vasilioglo a big amount of money and his house in cards. 

During the conflict, Nicolai Ibris shot Victor Vasilioglo multiple times  from a hunting rifle, injuring him in the head and abdomen.

The attacker was arrested on August 19 in Cahul district. The court ordered a preventive measure of arrest for 30 days.

items.title: Comrat // He died after he was shot in the head because he won a house in "cards"

fields.social_Titlu: The soldiers of the National Army are training in Germany
fields.lead: A troop of soldiers of the National Army participates currently during August 27th - September 16th at the multinational exercise "Combined Resolve VII", that is taking place in Germany.
fields.Continut:
A troop of soldiers of the National Army participates currently during August 27th - September 16th at the multinational exercise "Combined Resolve VII", that is taking place in Germany.

According to the contingent commander, major Victor Trohin, the exercise, which is led by the U.S. Army's European Rotational Force (USAREUR), aims to prepare jointly the soldiers from allied and partner countries of NATO, but also ensure the level of interoperability required by international missions.

The source mentioned that the National Army detached officers and and non-commissioned officers from the 22nd peacekeeping battalion at the "Combined Resolve VII".

At the exercise from this year, that is taking place at the Army's Grafenwoehr and Hohenfels Training Areas in southeastern Germany, includes more than 3500 participants from Armenia, Bosnia-Herzegovina, Belgium, Bulgaria, France, Hungary, Macedonia, Moldova, Montenegro, Norway, Poland, Romania, Serbia, Slovenia, Ukraine, and the United States.

The National Army participated at the exercises in Germany since 2012.

items.title: The soldiers of the National Army are training in Germany

fields.social_Titlu: Russian  troops from Transnistria continue training to „protect us” from the terrorists
fields.lead: The illegally dislocated on the left side of the Nistru river, Russian troops continue to train in the military exercises regardless of the agreement from the Joint Control Commission which determined that during the period of Commission's vacation, which lasts from August 1 till September 15th, to restrain itself from any provocative actions which could diminish the situation in the territory.
fields.Continut:
According to vesti.pmr, yesterday the Operative Group of Russian Troops administration conducted practical meetings to deflect an attack on a Peace Maintaining Forces post from a group of terrorists, who were planning to create a passage to transport munitions and penetration of the illegal troops into Security Zone. The pacifying troops requested backup, after that they blocked and destroyed the terrorist group. At the exercises participated almost 150 soldiers, 10 units of military technique, 3,5 thousand maneuver munitions and means of imitation.     

We remind you that right after the last JCC meeting from July 28th, where the delegations agreed that, during summer holiday of the Commission officials, the sides will restrain themselves from unilateral actions that could create tension and diminish the situation in the Security Zone, the non-authorized exercises of the Russian troops and Transnistrian troops started on the next day of the annual JCC holiday and continues at the present day.  

Both, the officials of the Russian Embassy were convoked repeatedly at the Ministry of Defense of the Republic of Moldova in August as well as the Russian Military attache at the Moldovan Ministry of External Affairs, but he did not attend the meetings. 

Afterwards, at the end of the August, the Russian-Transnistrian military exercises started a statement war at Bucharest between Russian Federation Embassy to Romania and the Republic of Moldova Embassy to Romania. The Russian diplomats from Bucharest were saying that the only goal of these Russian-Transnistrian applications is to deflect an eventual terrorist attack on the munition deposit from Colbasna. These munitions would be an easy pray for the terrorists that already targeted "EU, Russia, Thailand and USA". The Moldovan diplomats referred to ECtHR decision from July 8th 2004, in the case of Ilascu and others vs the Republic of Moldova and Russia, stated that Russian Armed Forces had a direct involvement in the war on the Nistru. At the same time the Republic of Moldova Diplomacy pointed out that the recent common maneuvers violate the Peace Convection signed by Mircea Snegur and Boris Yeltsin in 1992, in which is clearly stated that the 14th Army units will respect the neutrality.

And the Deputy Prime Minister, Minister of Foreign Affairs and European Integration, Andrei Galbur repeated that the Moldovan Authorities are concerned regarding the military applications of the Russian Armed Forces conducted in common with Paramilitary Structures of the Tiraspol regime, in the dialogue with the Russian Federation Ambassador to the Republic of Moldova, Farit Muhametsin.

items.title: Russian  troops from Transnistria continue training to „protect us” from the terrorists

fields.social_Titlu: Platon wants to be heard by the prosecutors and lawyers look for support from EU, US and RF Embassy
fields.lead: The businessman  Veaceslav Platon asked prosecutors to be heard aside the case he is judicially inquired and in other cases that he can testify. Platon submitted a request on the name of the prosecutor Andrei Baiesu, through his lawyer, Ana Ursachi, who thought on this occasion that men of the law should consider the statements of her client.
fields.Continut:
"For 12 days, since he is in the 13th Penitentiary, Veaceslav Platon was not heard by any prosecutor", mentioned in this context Ursachi. 

The Attorney claims that "Platon is not remanded for his involvement in the billion theft, but for a transaction when Plahotniuc sold shares from «Victoriabank»”, a 80 billion dollars transaction, "although, the prosecutors found only 49 billion dollars".

According to the lawyer, his client states that the final beneficiary of the bank thefts would be Vladimir Plahotniuc. 

During the same press conference, the Russian advocate Ilia Novikov mentioned that, while the Platon's extradition can not be cancelled, the court from the Republic of Moldova can consider the fact that his client was extradited illegally.

Novikov also said that he was transported from Ukraine to Moldova with a private jet, with 12 seats, and his extradition was extraordinary fast, that is fueling suspicion that there were made some deals at the structural level between Moldovan and Ukrainian sides. At the same time,  the lawyer does not subscribe to the allegations appeared on the public space, according to which there was a direct agreement between Vladimir Plahotniuc and the Ukrainian President, Petro Poroshenko. 

At the same press conference, Novikov mentioned that, after Shor's testimonies against Platon, the Mayor from Orhei was transferred in house arrest. The attorney does not exclude therefore that there was an agreement between prosecutors and Ilan Shor regarding his testimonies and his transfer from the solitary to house arrest.

The advocate also said that at the moment he is seeking for support from the EU Diplomacy, US Diplomacy and Russian Federation Diplomacy, because he has a Russian citizenship: "An official of the Russian Embassy can visit him in the solitary, because Platon is also a Russian citizen". 

"Only the simple presence of a diplomat in the court room would make judges to do the right thing", mentioned Novicov.

We remind you that Platon was wanted internationally on July 25th, on his name was issued an arrest warrant for 30 days. Exactly in the same day, "the Nr.1 Raider from CIS" was arrested in Kiev by Ukrainian Authorities. Afterwards, the Ukrainian court issued an arrest warrant for 40 days on his name, time used for his extradition procedure. 

The arrest warrant was issued by Authorities from Chisinau, after the prosecutors searched and have raised documents from different banks, at some offices, as well as at the houses of some individuals, inclusively after Shor's self-denouncement, who specified that he gave to Platon credits from BEM, that have not been paid back. The measures were taken during an extended inquiry file regarding the banking fraud. According to the men of the law, this case has connections to another case regarding laundering of 20 billion dollars through a Moldovan bank.

items.title: Platon wants to be heard by the prosecutors and lawyers look for support from EU, US and RF Embassy

fields.social_Titlu: Romania's Government will continue to fund the construction and renovation of Moldovan kindergartens
fields.lead: The Romanian Government decided to continue financing the construction and renovation of the Moldovan kindergartens. This was discussed last night at an event organised by the Romanian Embassy, where the results of the implementation of the Financial and Technical Assistance Program offered by the Romanian Government for the construction and renovation of the preschool institutions from our country, were summed up. During this Program, 832 kindergartens from all the districts of the Republic of Moldova were repaired.
fields.Continut:
The Prime-Minister Pavel Filip mentioned that the financial assistance offered by Romania is very important for our country and offered the opportunity for thousands of children to learn in up-to-date conditions, and for other thousands employees to work in better work conditions. At the same time, Pavel Filip highly appreciated the decision of the Romanian Government to continue the project in the year of 2016, offering additional three billion euros, as a grant, for the reparation of another 85 kindergartens from Moldova. 

"The relations between the states are often considered abstract, but in this case, we have the example of some projects that were realized in very important fields for society. The offered assistance, proves us one more time that Romania was and remains the most consequent supporter of Moldova", noted the Prime-Minister, Pavel Filip.   

At the same time the Prime-Minister spoke about the importance of the development of the educational system and offering to the young generation the opportunity to develop their professional skills, that is a priority for the Moldovan Government, which will continue to invest in this sector. "The children are our future, but for them it must become present, not future. Let's build together the future of our children", concluded Pavel Filip.

In turn, the Romanian Ambassador in Chisinau, Daniel Ionita, highlighted that Romania was always with the Republic of Moldova, offered support in education, as well as in other fields where the support was requested. At the same time, the Romanian diplomat said that the good results obtained during the Program, convinced the Romanian Government to continue financing the Program. 

"This Program does not mean only numbers, it meas first of all people. It is not important the value of 23 billion euros, it is not important even the fact that 832 preschool institutions were repaired. What is important is education, important is that every second  kindergarten from Moldova benefited from this Program, important are those over 200 thousand of beneficiaries of this Program, children that are going to European standards kindergartens, parents that can work, knowing that their children are safe, employees and teaching staff that are going to work", emphasized Daniel Ionita. 

From the money offered by the Romanian Government, until today were renovated 832 kindergartens. Depending on the problems, in the institutions were repaired rooftops, installed heating systems, and built playgrounds.

"We have almost 240 kindergartens that were thermally insulated that leads to savings in the local and national budget", stated the CEO of the Moldovan Social Investment Fund, Mircea Esanu.

The Financial and Technical Assistance Program offered by the Romanian Government for the construction and renovation of the preschool institutions from the Republic of Moldova was launched in 2014 and is implemented by the Moldovan Social Investment Fund. During two years, were assigned 23 billion euros for the renovation and furnishing 832 kindergartens from all the districts of the country.

items.title: Romania's Government will continue to fund the construction and renovation of Moldovan kindergartens

fields.social_Titlu: American military men arrived to Chisinau to participate at the „Fire Shield” maneuvers
fields.lead: Military men from the North Carolina Army National Guard arrived to Chisinau to participate at the ”Fire Shield 2016” military exercises. At the maneuvers that will take place at Bulboaca training military Base, will participate 30 American military men, 30 military men from the Romanian Armed Forces and 233 military men from the Moldovan Armed Forces.
fields.Continut:
Those 30 military men arrived at Chisinau yesterday with an US Army airplane. 

The exercise is important for the Moldovan Armed Forces, because it has the goal to prepare the artillery sub-units and improve the interoperability between the military men from the Moldovan Armed Forces, Romanian Armed Forces and US Army.     

During the exercises, the participating classes will train to shoot in the battle from covered positions, as well as driving battle vehicles with platoons and during mixed divisions, being led by the Colonel Andrei Shevcenko.

items.title: American military men arrived to Chisinau to participate at the „Fire Shield” maneuvers

fields.social_Titlu: National and US Special Armed Forces - joined training at Bulboaca
fields.lead: Military men from the Special Destination Battalion "Fulger" (BDS) are participating during 1-30 September 2016 at the exercises „Joint Combined Exchange Training — 2016" (JCET), which is held at the military training base of the Moldovan Armed Forces.
fields.Continut:
According to the BDS commander, Lieutenant Colonel Veaceslav Balan, those 60 Moldovan military men are trained by 10 instructors from 10th Group of the US Army Special Forces (Airborne) at executing special shooting and tactic missions with combat shooting at group level, scouting, as well as training exercises in the field. 

The source mentioned the the joined traiing of the Moldovan Armed Forces and US Army have as goal to test and increase the interoperability between the two armies.

„Joint Combined Exercise Training", at which the BDS military men are participating starting with 2012, is developing during the Peace Partnership Program.

items.title: National and US Special Armed Forces - joined training at Bulboaca

fields.social_Titlu: The General Prosecution's Office message for politicians: Mind your business and do not involve us
fields.lead: The General Prosecution's Office does not want to be involved in political confrontations and electoral debates, is said in a press release published by the institution earlier today.
fields.Continut:
Considering the fact that the General Prosecution's Office is assaulted by complains from the electoral candidates, solving of which is not in the competence of the prosecutors, stated the General Prosecution's Office, in a press release, that is setting the boundaries from any attempt to involve the institution in political confrontations and electoral debates.           Având în vedere faptul că este asaltată de plângeri parvenite din partea concurenţilor electorali, soluţionarea cărora nu intră în competenţa procurorilor, Procuratura Generală a declarat, într-un comunicat de presă, că se delimitează de orice încercare de a atrage instituţia în confruntări de natură politică şi dispute electorale. 

Within this context, the Prosecution's Office - which is an independent and apolitical organ - is launching a call to all the electoral candidates and political parties, to inform themselves as accurate as possible about the functional attributions and principles of the institution, so they would restrain themselves to involve the institution in political confrontations and electoral debates. In the case, in which there were after all, violated some laws, that would be the object of investigation in penal sense, we ask electoral actors to inform the law organs in the established way for competent examination of them.          

In this sense, we confirm that no matter of the political calendar in the country, the prosecutors will continue to manifest balance and professionalism in their activities, having as a single aim the respect of law, making justice, defending the rights and legitimate liberties of the citizen and society.     

Deschide.MD reminds that on September 4th, Maia Sandu, the nominee from the Action and Solidarity Party (PAS) stated that she will inform the General Prosecution's Office on the case of collecting within 24 hours of the necessary amount of signatures for the Democrat Party (PD) candidate Marian Lupu.         

A few days ago, Sergiu Sarbu, member of the Democrat Party, mentioned in a post on his Facebook account that will inform CEC, the Prosecution's Office and other organs on the matter of serious "violations" admitted by the representatives of the "Dignity and Truth Platform" Party in the process of gathering the signatures for submission of its candidate for Presidential elections.

items.title: The General Prosecution's Office message for politicians: Mind your business and do not involve us

fields.social_Titlu: From October 1st we will pay more for the thermal energy
fields.lead: The National Energy Regulatory Agency (ANRE) decided today to raise the price for thermal energy with 81 lei, and it will cost 1068 lei per Gcal. The decision was made after JSC "Termoelectrica" requested the raise of the price for the production of the thermal energy delivered to the consumers with 27,4 %, up to 1257,38 lei per Gcal.
fields.Continut:
The new tariffs for the thermal energy will be valid from October 1st 2016. Termoelectrica motivated this significant rise request of the costs for production and delivery of the thermal and electrical energy since the last adjustment in 2011. 

After analyzing the requested prices and the presented afferent materials by JSC "Termoelectrica", ANRE accepted to increase only the costs that correspond to the Methodology of the determination, approval and application of the tariffs for the delivered thermal energy to the consumers, approved by the decision of the Administration Council No. 482 from 6.09. 2012. In this exercise, ANRE guided itself by the principle of covering the needed minimum of expenditures and justified by the good carrying out of the established activities of JSC "Termoelectrica", with the efficient use of the production capacities. 

In this way, ANRE observed the existence of some objective factors that lead to the increasing the tariffs for delivery of the thermal energy to the consumers in the established period 2011-2015: 

- the modification of the final prices for the natural gas channeled by CET, the central power station for production and supply of thermal energy to the urban consumers through centralized supply system;

- the increase in price of the material consumption and exploitation and repairs expenses as a result of the national currency devaluation;

- The increasing of the consumption afferent to the work remuneration in the result of the guaranteed minimum quantum of the salary in the real sector of economy.   

At the same time, ANRE decreased the next components of the tariff that lead to the diminish of it comparing with the requested price: the lost in the thermal energy network, the established capital cost, operational costs and established profit. The adjustment argumentation operated by ANRE in the estimation of the requested tariffs and final costs were presented by ANRE experts during the public meeting of the Administration Council. The costs may by found also on the Informative Note regarding the delivering costs of the thermal energy to the consumers by JSC "Termoelectrica" in 2016, published on the official ANRE website. 

The costs for delivery of the thermal energy approved by ANRE is the same for all the categories of consumers. The new tariff will be available from the day of publishing the decision in the Official Monitor of the Republic of Moldova.

The last adjustment of the prices for thermal energy by JSC "Termocom" was aproved on Octomber 21th 2011. Then the prices were raised with 9,9% or with 89 lei, from 821 lei per Gcal to 987 lei per Gcal.

items.title: From October 1st we will pay more for the thermal energy

fields.social_Titlu: National Army soldiers participate in an exercise in Romania
fields.lead: A platoon of the 22nd peacekeeping Battalion participate from September 19th to 30th at the training module "Platinum Lynx 16.5", held in Babadag polygon from Tulcea, Romania.
fields.Continut:
The module is part of the multinational exercise scenario "Black Sea Rotational Force 16 "(BSRF 16) organized by the Command of US Marine Corps Forces deployed in Europe and Africa, and aims to increase interoperability through joint preparation of the soldiers to participate in peacekeeping and counterinsurgency operations.

At "Platinum Lynx 16.5," Moldovan peacekeepers do firing with the armament in endowment, and missions of first aid training in the areas of operations and procedures for control and supervision in subunits. 

At the practice from the Babadag polygon participate over 200 soldiers from the Romanian Land Forces and over 300 soldiers from Bulgaria,   Macedonia, Montenegro, Republic of Moldova, Slovenia, United States of America and Ukraine.

items.title: National Army soldiers participate in an exercise in Romania

fields.social_Titlu: EXCLUSIVE // UPDATE: Thirteen judges detained by the CNA officers and anti corruption prosecutors
fields.lead: UPDATE (1:24 PM) Six more judges were detained today during the operation realized by the anti-corruption prosecutors and the officers of the National Anti-corruption Center.  In addition, were detained 2 judicial executors. Now we have 15 persons were detained: judges, former judges and judicial executors.
fields.Continut:
UPDATE (12:12 AM): "I confirm the operation of the anti-corruption prosecutors, along with the CNA officers. The domiciliary visits are carried out in several law courts and homes, throughout the country.  So far were detained seven judges, on cases that aim acts of corruption, however the operations are ongoing and I confine myself to this information for the moment. I will come back with details later, and at their end you will receive more detailed information," declared for Deschide.MD, the public relations officer of CNA - Angela Starinschi.

UPDATE (12:04 AM): Four more judges were captured within the extensive operation carried out by the CNA and the anti-corruption prosecutors. 

11:18 AM: The anti-corruption prosecutors and CNA officers carried out domiciliary visits in several law courts from the country and in the homes of certain people with folders that aim acts of corruption. At this hour were detained 3 judges, and actions are ongoing, stated sources nearby the investigators for deschide.md

The operation continues, following that, on its completion, the investigators will offer more information. 

Stay tuned for details!

items.title: EXCLUSIVE // UPDATE: Thirteen judges detained by the CNA officers and anti corruption prosecutors

fields.social_Titlu: EXCLUSIVE // The list of judges detained by the anti-corruption prosecutors.
fields.lead: The Anti-Corruption Prosecutors along with the CNA officers made today domiciliary visits at the working places and homes of 20 representatives of the judiciary system, in a dossier opened on corruption acts. During a press conference, the Chief of the Anti-Corruption Prosecutor's Office, Viorel Morari declared that until this hour were detained 18 persons: 15 judges and three judicial executors. One of them - Igor Vornicescu - was detained exactly on the Chisinau International Airport, where he was trying to flee abroad.
fields.Continut:
Another one - Victor Orandas - appears in the dossier, but his detention was not possible because he was not in the country. Most likely, on his name will be issued an order to get him in the international wanted list 

The public relations officer of CNA, Angela Starinschi stated that all that 18 detained persons are in the CNA isolator.

According to the judiciary sources of the Deschide.MD editorial office, the other 14 handcuffed judges are:

Stefan Nita - judge at the Court of Appeal

Garri Bivol - judge at the Law Court of the "Centru" district 

Iurie Turcan - former magistrate at the law court of Rascani

Liliana Andrias - Centru Law Court

Iurie Harbu – Telenesti Law Court

Serghei Popovici – president  of the Comrat Law Court

Gheorghe Barnaz – magistrate from the Rascani Law Court 

Valeriu Gasca – judge at the Rascani Law Court 

Serghei Gubenсo - Comrat Law Court

Serghei Lebediuc - Military Law Court

Mihai Moraru - Ungheni Law Court

Aurica Us - former magistrate from the Rascani Law Court

Gheorghe Marchitan - magistrate at the Causeni Law Court

Gheorghe Gorun - former judge from the Rascani Law Court of the capital

It seems that they are present in a case started in connection with the laundering of that 20 billion dollars of the Russian Federation. They appear also in the journalistic investigations done on this subject by ziarulnational.md and anticoruptie.md. 

Some of them have resigned in the meantime, while others got a promotion. It is certain that all concerned in the file, who were found until today in the public office were suspended.

items.title: EXCLUSIVE // The list of judges detained by the anti-corruption prosecutors. A magistrate caught in the Aeroport

fields.lead: The Anti-Corruption Prosecutors and the investigation officers from CNA detained yesterday 18 people from the judicial system, among who are 15 magistrates, in 16 files started on complicity at money laundering in large proportions. The state accusers are saying that these dossiers were begun only now, because right now other persons, detained in the files referring to those 20 milliards of dollars laundering, started to talk, and the "puzzles" of the infringement of the law are becoming clearer. It is about the documents, phone calls, statements of complicity, and also the answers that came from the rogatory commissions from several states.
fields.Continut:
"After the arrest of the pretended businessman and his extradition (it is about Veaceslav Platon - Eds), people started to talk. They understand that we do are not joking and we are going to finish this case", specified Morari, avoiding to pronounce Platon's name or any other arrested persons. 

As for those four judicial executors aimed by the penal investigation, Morari states that they will have to explain why they did not collected the fees in the laundering cases, because this is the reason the state budget missed an income of 962 millions MDL, which the  judicial executors should have paid to the Government.  

"It is about over 20 billions dollars, which were received after some counterfeited documents by the executors. The cases are a part of a pile of penal cases launched on the scheme of money laundering through Moldova since 2014. In the scheme are involved Ukrainians and our citizens. The scheme took place through multiple off-shore companies and Russian companies. For now we do not have information about money location", stated the Chief of the Anti-Corruption Prosecutor's Office, Viorel Morari. 

The criminal prosecution regarding those 16 actual and ex-judges arrested yesterday by the prosecutors and anti-corruption officers started last week based on an ordinance issued by the temporary Prosecutor General, Eduard Harunjen. According to Viorel Morari, the suspects may get from 5 to 10 years of jail. All the arrested judges and executors have the status of suspect and are arrested for 72 hours, after that the decision if they will be imprisoned before trial.

"The undertaken actions against the judges, I want to mention that were done with the approval of the Superior Council of Magistracy. The Prosecutor General addressed a notice on this matter to the Superior Council of Magistracy and they authorized some of the addressed notices from the prosecutor general," declared Morari. 

The Chief of the Criminal Prosecution Department of the CNA, Bogdan Zubreanu, stated yesterday that 51 searches were made in the offices, houses and cars of multiple judges and former judges. 

"The operation started at 10:00 o'clock, after the Superior Council of Magistracy has given the order, as a result of the searches in the offices of the suspects. Afterwards, to CNA were brought 15 judges and three judicial executors, who were detained for 72 hours. The operation developed without any accidents and the intervention of the special troops was not necessary. All the materials that were confiscated at the spot, documents and digital supports, were submitted to the Criminal Prosecution organ and we will examine them", explained Zumbreanu.

We remind you that 15 judges and three judicial executors were arrested yesterday after an extended searches made by the Anti-Corruption Prosecutors and CNA officers. The inspections took place aiming corruption facts.  

Earlier, based on the same fraud case, an ex-governor of BNM (Ema Tabarta), and two Department Chiefs from the National Bank of Moldova. At the same time, a Vice-president of "Moldincombank", the chief accountant and deputy chief accountant, also the chief of the bank branch were placed in custody. 

We are publishing below the scheme which was the base of the laundering of those over 20 billions:

items.title: The prosecutors presented the scheme of USD milliards laundering from the corrupt judges' file

fields.social_Titlu: The Ministry of Defense asks Moscow to stop the military exercises on the left side of Dniester
fields.lead: The Ministry of Defense from Chisinau wants to inform the Russian Federation Defense Ministry about the unacceptable activities of the Russian Operational maneuver group (GOTR) dislocated in the Transnistrian region and to take actions for avoiding this kind of activities in the future.
fields.Continut:
According to a press release, the officials of the Defense Policy and Planning Directorate had a meeting this week with the members of the Office of the Military and Air Attache of the Russian Federation with the headquarters in Chisinau. The dialog that took place at the request of the Ministry of Defense, was focused on the activity of the Russian Operational maneuver group (GOTR) in the Transnistrian region, as well as other collaboration aspects.    

The Superior of DGPAPA, Colonel Alexandru Harea, expressed during the meeting the concern of the Ministry of Defense regarding the last actions developed in Transnistria. 

The quoted source specified that the Ministry of Defence condemns the organisation and the development of the so called "anti-terror" exercises, as well as the GOTR participation at the organized activities by the so called high administration from Transnistria.  

"Actions like this contravene to the international right principle, they are qualified as illegal and they are unacceptable on the territory of the Republic of Moldova, that is why the necessity of the unconditioned retreat of the foreign military formations without a determined judicial status from the territory of the country and their munitions is enforced. In this context, the administration of the Ministry of Defense requested to inform the Russian Federation Defense Ministry about the unacceptable activities of the GOTR and to take actions for avoiding this kind of activities in the future"

We remind you that a few days ago, the administration of the Russian Operational Maneuver Group developed other military applications at the Tiraspol's polygon, during which the reject the attack of some presumed "illegal military formations" on some military targets from the Tiraspol's garrison. 

During the trainings an extra attention was given to mastering the interaction of the GOTR anti-terror sub-units in the open field fights. At the same time, the sapper sub-units developed the research of a mined territory from the parking lot and defused the explosives. During the applications were used over a thousand maneuver rounds and imitation pyrotechnics means.  

We specify the fact that for the first time in history, GOTR realized mutual military applications with so called Transnistrian Military Forces in July and August of 2016. The Ministry of Defense of the Republic of Moldova disapproved those applications and summoned the Military Attache of the Russian Federation to Chisinau, but he refused to come. Chisinau demanded to stop immediately of the applications on its territory.   

GOTR is a part of the Western Military District of the Russian Federation. Vladimir Putin disposed on August 25

items.title: The Ministry of Defense asks Moscow to stop the military exercises on the left side of Dniester

fields.social_Titlu: All the magistrates and judicial executors detained by CNA and PA, arrested for 30 days
fields.lead: Those three magistrates that were supposed, today, to appear in front of the judges, in order to decide their preventive measure, were arrested for 30 days.
fields.Continut:
We remind you that, yesterday, other 12 magistrates and three judicial executors were arrested for a term of 30 days. Some of those 15 people who have come today in front of the judges did not wish to appear in the court, and the hearings took place without them.

Also yesterday, the chief of the Anti-Corruption Prosecutor's Office, Viorel Morari, declared, for Deschide.MD, that the approaches of the prosecutors to apply imprisonement before trial on the names of those 15 magistrates and 3 judicial executors detained. In addition, on the names of the other two persons, is concluded the procedure of searching.

"In the case of one of them about whom we know that is still in the country, the staff of IGP is involved to identify the place where he is", added Morari.

That 15 judges and three judicial executors were detained two days ago, following extensive searches made by the anti-corruption prosecutors and officers of CNA. The domiciliary visits took place in the court files hinting acts of corruption referring to the laundering of those 20 billions of US dollars from the Russian Federation.

Previously, in the dossiers about the same fraud, a former deputy governor of NBM (Ema Tabarta), and two Department Chiefs from the National Bank of Moldova. At the same time, a Vice-president of "Moldindconbank", the chief accountant and the deputy chief accountant, and the chief of a bank branch were placed under arrest. 

The state accusers stated yesterday, in a press conference, that these dossiers were begun only now, because right now other persons, detained in the files referring to those 20 milliards of dollars laundering, started to talk, and the "puzzles" of the infringement of the law are becoming clearer.

items.title: All the magistrates and judicial executors detained by CNA and PA, arrested for 30 days

fields.social_Titlu: Maia Sandu was robbed this morning at the Airport
fields.lead: The candidate for the function of the President of the Republic of Moldova, Maia Sandu, had a unfortunate experience this morning, at the Chisinau International Airport. She was missing her wallet in which she had 15 euros and 5 dollars.
fields.Continut:
The incident happened while the PAS leader was in the Airport's sterile area. According to the video footage, she dropped the wallet, and a man picked it up and ran away. When Maia Sandu realized that the wallet is missing, she alerted the border police. 

The public relations officer of IGP, Natalia Bucur-Bandas, stated for Deschide.MD that the person who took the wallet was identified, and the object - returned. He was a citizen from Barcelona, who spoke Russian language.  

According to the article 105, Contravention Code of the Republic of Moldova, a protocol was written to the malefactor.  

Stealing in small proportions the owner's property by theft, misappropriation, embezzlement, abuse of power or swindling is sanctioned with a fine from 50 to 100 conventional units or by unpaid community work for 40 to 60 hours, or by arrest up to 15 days.

items.title: Maia Sandu was robbed this morning at the Airport

fields.lead: EBRD provides a loan of €41 million for the extension of the Iasi-Ungheni pipeline to Chisinau, at the request of the Government of Moldova. Total project cost is €93 million and the difference may be covered by an EIB sovereign loan and the co-financing from the EU.
fields.Continut:
The new pipeline will connect the existing gas infrastructure networks in Ungheni (Moldova) and Iasi (Romania). The proposed pipeline is approximately 120 km in length and 600 mm diameter.

The EBRD announces on its page that it is working with several partners in the preparation of the project, including with the EU, the Energy Community, the EIB and Swedish International Development Cooperation Agency (SIDA) among others.

The project aims to enhance Moldova's energy security by diversifying its gas supply sources. The project will also include a gas sector reform action plan with the objective to liberalize and reform the Moldovan gas sector. Therefore, the project will support the reform agenda in the gas sector through market liberalization in compliance with Moldova's undertakings to EU and  Energy Community.

For the project implementation purposes, the financing will be on-lent by the government of Moldova to VestMoldTransgaz ("VMTG"), a fully state-owned transmission system operator of Ungheni-Chisinau gas pipeline and Romania-Moldova interconnector.

The environmental and social appraisal of this project included several site visits (including various meetings and field visits) by EBRD staff. 

In the project description on the official page of EBRD, is written that the pipeline crosses areas of relatively low population density, and the land is mainly in private agricultural use, including pastures, orchards and some forest. A large portion of the pipeline parallels an existing utility corridor and is adjacent to an existing road. This approach has been adopted to avoid and minimise environmental and social sensitivities. Further, a robust review of alternative alignments was completed to ensure that the final route was selected to avoid as many impacts as possible. Upon review of the alternatives, alignment 1b was selected. The pipeline will not impact critical habitat nor will it encroach upon any protected area, although it will cross 100 m of the buffer zone for the Plaiul Fagului Scientific Reserve, and will approach the border for the Cazimir Milesti Landscape Reserve (both alignments are allowed according to local legislation and EBRD requirements). It should also be recognised that the pipeline can accommodate micro-realignments of up to 1,000 meters based on any sensitivities or conditions that may be encountered during the construction phase. Any deviations outside this zone will require prior approval by the Bank. 

In addition to owner monitoring of the implementation of these plans, if the EBRD finances this project, the Bank's Environmental and Sustainability Department will monitor the environmental and social performance during construction and operation of the project.

The Iasi-Ungheni pipeline is interconnecting the gas networks of Romania and Moldova, whose construction began on 27 August 2013. In July 2014, the pipeline was completed, taking place the first tests. It was inaugurated on August 27, 2014, exactly one year after the start of its construction in the presence of the Prime Minister of Moldova, Iurie Leanca and Romanian Prime Minister, Victor Ponta.

The pipeline is expected to transport 500 million cubic meters of gas in the first phase, following in the next phase to be built also a compressor station. The sub-crossing portion of the river is 700 meters, the pipeline is 16 km in length on the Romanian side and 11 km on the Moldovan territory.

The pipeline will be able to carry at full capacity - 1.5 billion cubic meters of gas, more than the 1.3 billion cubic meters of gas which is the necessary consumption of Moldova. The investment is worth €26.5 million.

items.title: EBRD provides €41 million to extend the Iasi-Ungheni gas pipeline to Chisinau

fields.social_Titlu: (Update) The number of detained customs officers has reached 28. The operation continues...
fields.lead: UPDATE (4:29 PM) By this time, 28 customs employees were detained after the searches of the anti-corruption prosecutors and CNA. The operation continues.
fields.Continut:
UPDATE (1:45 PM) In the wake of these searches, 20 customs officers were placed in the National Anti-Corruption Center (CNA) Isolator for 72 hours. Among them is also the head of the Bender Customs Bureau. The white collar appears in the same criminal file for passive corruption due to which where conducted searches at the customs posts Palanca and Tudora.

UPDATE (10:44 AM) 15 customs officers were detained so far by the personnel of CNA and the anti-corruption prosecutors in a wide operation conducted in the morning at the border checkpoints Palanca and Tudora. The information is confirmed by the public relations officers of CNA.

UPDATE (09:40 AM) By this time eight customs officers are detained says the public relations officer of CNA - Angela Starinschi.

UPDATE (09:32 AM) The Customs Service was informed about the actions that the CNA and anti-corruption prosecutors have unfolded today, as well as the detention of several fellow worker of the institution, though comments regarding the today operative actions will be offered after its ending. The today action is based on operative information and materials provided by the Department of the Homeland of the Customs Service, is mentioned in a communique of the institution.

In point of the initiated investigation by the investigating authority, we abstain from any comments until the operation will be fully completed and we will have official statements from the investigators. The Customs Service has supported both the operation of the anti-corruption prosecutors, and also the actions preceding it.

We express our regret for extending the waiting time at the two border checkpoints caused by an objective situation. We strive to fluidize the crossing at the customs Tudora and Palanca in the shortest time. On these lines, we decided to bring additional staff from other shifts and, if it is necessary, we will bring staff from other subdivisions, says the Customs Service.

UPDATE (08:25 AM) Till now were detained 5 customs officers, but the action is ongoing. The searches are taking place in several homes and two customs. According to our sources it is possible that a large number of those customs officers present at the two border checkpoints are going to be detained today by the anti-corruption prosecutors.

The anti-corruption prosecutors and the CNA officers conducted domiciliary visits in two border checkpoints, Palanca and Tudora. Both customs are closed at this moment by the investigators and no one is allowed to cross the border.

At this point, the searches are done in that two customs and in the residences of several customs officers.

According to some sources among the investigators, several customs officers were detained, but is not known their number nor the investigation upon which is based the operation.

We will be back with details.

items.title: (Update) The number of detained customs officers has reached 28. The operation continues...

fields.social_Titlu: Armasu, the victim of a hooligan gesture. Donica spilled a bucket with milk on his head
fields.lead: The civic activist, Andrei Donica, known for his eccentric methods for manifesting his discontent towards the authorities, spilled over the Ministry of Finance, Octavian Armasu, a bucket with milk.
fields.Continut:
It happened a little while ago at the intersection of the Puskin street and Stefan cel Mare boulevard, where Donica has installed two trailers, as a sign of protest towards the Government. 

He accused the Minister of Finance for the fiscal illegalities, showing him demonstratively that he bought a milk pack form JLC and did not receive a check for it. According to the activist, the Ministry was sometimes the chairman of the mentioned company.  

Another reason of the protestant was based on the decision to transform the stolen billion in state debt. 

In turn, the Minister said that no one asked any money from people, naming Chirtoaca - "an ass". Also the official argued with the activist that he does not own "trailers that can afford Chirtoaca", showing towards the protestant's trailers. 

From the video footage we can see that the hooligan attitude was premeditated. At least this resulted from the fact that the activist Oleg Brega was there, with a video camera to record the moment.

items.title: Armasu, the victim of a hooligan gesture. Donica spilled a bucket with milk on his head

fields.social_Titlu: Miting at the Parlament // PSRM, PPDA, PN & PLDM - reunited after the Motion failed
fields.lead: PPDA, PSRM, PLDM and PN members - but also a group of deputies - have protested today  at the Parliament, when the Motion of censure against the Filip Government was to be debated. The protesters stated that they are against the Government decision to transform all the state guarantees for BEM, BS and UB in state debt.
fields.Continut:
The leader of the Socialist Party, Igor Dodon, declared to the protesters at the Parliament that a new Motion of censure against the Filip Government will be lodged. Dodon stated that the lack of quorum is not a reason that they should not examine the Motion of no confidence.   

The protesters have chanted slogans against the Filip Government, in front of the policemen that have surrounded the main entrance of the Parliament.

We specify that at the end of September, the PPDA leader, as well as PAS leader, stated during the "Interpol" TV show at the TV7 Chanel that they will go to a mutual protest on the day when the Motion of no confidence will be examined, "because the money must be recovered from the funds where they have arrived, not from the citizens". But today Maia Sandu did not come to the protest. 

More than that, the PAS leader, is writing on her Facebook account that "the initiator of the Motion" [The president of PSRM, Igor Dodon - Eds.] „is miming the opposition against the government, and the government is miming the application of the democratic tool, which is the Motion of no confidence”. 

Sandu also writes that "the meeting was summoned in the way that the mobilization of the citizens would be impossible, the only ones who will carry this burden of this decision. The take over of the debts provoked by the bank theft is a very important subject to be treated with such little seriousness". 

We remind you that the Motion against the Government failed because of the lack of quorum. At the meeting came 47 deputies from PSRM, PCRM and PLDM. For the first time, the meeting was held by the vice-president Vladimir Vitiuc, but his minute of glory lasted a little longer than a minute.

items.title: Miting at the Parlament // PSRM, PPDA, PN & PLDM - reunited after the Motion failed

fields.social_Titlu: ANRE ceiling prices // The gasoline A-95 price is reduced by 0,01 lei and diesel - raised by 0,21
fields.lead: The National Energy Regulatory Agency (ANRE) has set new ceiling prices for Premium-95 gasoline and diesel fuel. According to new prices, gasoline is cheaper by 0,01 lei and diesel is more expensive by 0,21 lei. The price for one liter of gasoline A-95 will not exceed 16,24 lei and for diesel fuel - 14,03 lei.
fields.Continut:
The new prices come into effect from tomorrow and will be valid until October 18th. Oil companies are required to adjust the retail price of fuels so as not to exceed the ANRE regulations.

The prices have been established by ANRE in accordance with the requirements of the new Methodology of formation and application of prices for petroleum products, in  effect since May 13, 2016. The prices posted today on ANRE’s webpage will be valid during 14 calendar days.

Acording to the Methodology, ANRE, every 14 days, on Tuesdays, sets the threshold of retail prices for gasoline, diesel and liquefied gas, and publishes them on its webpage until 1 PM. On the same day, each operator on the oil products market will establish, proceeding from the ceiling prices set by ANRE, the retail prices for the oil products, will publish them on its webpage and will post them on informative panels placed at fuel supply stations. The prices set by operators will enter into force and will be applied for all consumers, starting from Wednesday midnight at 12:01 AM.

items.title: ANRE ceiling prices // The gasoline A-95 price is reduced by 0,01 lei and diesel - raised by 0,21

fields.lead: Ilan Shor's advocates will use yesterday's decision of Central Electoral Commission to register him as a trustworthy person of the nominee to the function of President, Inna Popenco, to release their client from house arrest. The information was announced, through his lawyers, from the Mayor of Orhei himself on his Facebook account.
fields.Continut:
"I want to inform you that tomorrow my attorneys will file a request regarding my discharge from house arrest because yesterday CEC registered me as a trustworthy person of the Presidential candidate. According to the article 45 and 105 of the Electoral Code, Inna Popenco, who was the status of a electoral contender, is in a disadvantageous position in relation with others candidates, having organisational troubles. We hope that the meeting regarding the high-mentioned thing will take place as soon as possible," says Shor.  

 

We remind that yesterday Central Electoral Commission registered Ilan Shor as a trustworthy person of Inna Popenco, who runs for President of the Republic of Moldova from the Social-Political Movement "Ravnopravie", lead by Ilan Shor. 

According to the Electoral Code, the trustworthy person "helps the candidate at the development of electoral campaign, does electioneering for his election, represents his interests in relations with public authorities, voters and electoral bodies." In this sense, Shor's defense may request the release of Ilan Shor under house arrest to carry out the duties provided by law.

According to the Anti-corruption prosecutor, Viorel Morari, "CEC's adjudication of a request regarding a potential right in the electoral process is lawful, but in Shor's case, this right contradicts with court's decision, which was issued to ensure the smooth conduct of the investigation.” and „Shor must stay in custody to avoid contact with witnesses and influencing people”.

items.title: Shor, after CEC's decision: My attorneys will request my discharge to meet the voters

fields.lead: Minister of Finance Octavian Armasu said that by assuming responsibility for the repayment of the debt to the National Bank of Moldova, the Government spared the population from a lot of big problems.
fields.Continut:
He made such a statement in the program “Moldova live” on the public TV channel Moldova 1, IPN reports.

“We assumed responsibility. This was a precondition imposed by the IMF. Otherwise, we cannot unlock external financing. By unlocking external financing, we spared the people from much bigger problems. Or else we wouldn’t be able to pay salaries, pensions, agricultural subsidies, etc. This would be a too serious blow,” stated the minister.

According to Armasu, the Government assumed this responsibility in order to ensure a return to normality. “We cannot return to normality with the own resources. This month we must sign the agreement with the IMF. Thus, in 2016 we will be able to get €55 million, which is 1 billion lei. Besides this money, there will also be other foreign loans,” said the minister.

Octavian Armasu assures that the people will not feel the burden of the repayment of the debt to the National Bank. “We are in an election campaign and they did some electoral calculations, saying the children who are yet to be born will also have to repay this debt. This subject is exploited for electoral purposes. We will make effort for this debt to be repaid with foreign resources more, with grants,” he stated.

items.title: Octavian Armasu: We spared people from big problems

fields.social_Titlu: Filip anounces 40% sale for almost 160 types of drugs
fields.lead: The prices for almost 160 types of prime necessity drugs will drop by nearly 40%, starting with October 12. The announcement was made by the Prime-Minister Pavel Filip, after the meeting with the leaders of pharmaceutical companies.
fields.Continut:
Filip added that actions of this kind will by extended in the future, today's decision being just the first phase in this sense.

„In March we approved an action plan in this sense. Some of these actions have been realized. I have always wanted the Government not to impose anything by force. Every problem can be solved when all players are participating in the market. I partnered with those from the pharmaceutical domain to identify solutions together. We have reached a common denominator. I'm glad to announce the fruits of this partnership. [...] You cannot get a discount by giving an indication from the Government, because businessmen are businessmen and each business must have profit, but then we have to discuss and see how we can work together," added the Prime-Minister.

We remind you that yesterday the Cabinet of Ministers approved amendments and additions to the Government Decision No. 348 of 2014 which aim to increase people's access to quality and affordable medicines. During this period it has already been established a simplified procedure for registration/re-registration for medicines in the European Economic Area or Switzerland, USA, Canada, Japan, Australia. In these cases, the rates will be 25% smaller than the previous ones. The same thing happens in the case of medical devices. Prices for registration and re-registration of medical devices will be reduced with 25%.

items.title: Filip anounces 40% sales for almost 160 types of drugs

fields.lead: The Moldovan Defense Minister promises to Russians a "green corridor" if they want to withdraw troops from Transnistria. The statement was made in an interview with the stiripesurse.ro news portal, during his official visit to Bucharest.
fields.Continut:
"I promise to our partners from the Russian Federation that if they really want to leave, I can start negotiations with the Ukrainian friends to create a green corridor under the supervision of the OSCE and the UN. It would be a gesture that would prove their good intentions towards Moldova, because at this moment we can see a lot of unfriendly and provocative gestures against us," said Salaru. 

Recently, Sergey Gubarev, the Special Mission Ambassador of the Russian Federation, said during a visit to Chisinau, that the withdrawal of Russian troops from Transnistria can not be done because of the war in Ukraine.

Source: stiripesurse.ro

items.title: Salaru: If Russians want to leave Transnistria, we will create them a green corridor

fields.social_Titlu: Wide scale searches in a big smuggling case with... clothes
fields.lead: Prosecutor's Office for Organized Crime Control and Special Causes and the SIS officers are carrying out searches in a case of smuggling of huge proportions. It's about consumer goods and especially - clothing.
fields.Continut:
The Prosecutor Vitalie Chisca, who leads this operation, stated for Deschide.MD that until now, were arrested five people, although in the file are mentioned eight. The criminal-procedural measures are continuing. 

The suspects have been bringing lots of undeclared cargo, and then selling it to several shops in the country. For a lower price than on the market, the smugglers were cashing some money under the table. 

The suspects might get up to 10 years in prison and their business risks to be shot down.  

We will come up with an update...

items.title: Wide scale searches in a big smuggling case with... clothes

fields.lead: Weather forecasters issued a yellow code advisory for heavy rain (15-35 liters per square meter), in parts even heavier (50 liters per square meter), and high northeastern winds of 15-18 m/s for the period between October 12 and 13, IPN reports.
fields.Continut:
According to the State Hydrometeorological Service, a warning for hydrological drought in the national rivers and lakes was issued for October 10-18. In this connection, the business entities and the population are urged to rationally use the water resources.

Sursa: IPN

items.title: Yellow code advisory for heavy rain all over Moldova

fields.social_Titlu: The CSM approved to criminally investigate a judge from Rezina
